text: Raghuvir Singh Kadian is a member of the Haryana Legislative Assembly from the Indian National Congress representing the Beri, Jhajjar Vidhan sabha Constituency in Haryana.He Won Six Time Election For Mla. == References == Category:Members of the Haryana Legislative Assembly Category:Haryana MLAs 2019– Category:Haryana MLAs 2014–2019
title: Raghuvir Singh Kadian
